Package GUI

Class StoreTableModel

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
GUI.StoreTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
public class StoreTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
Defines the table model for the displaying the Items from the Store during the game.
Version:
1.2, 20 May 2021.
Author:
John Elliott
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • StoreTableModel

      public StoreTableModel​(java.util.ArrayList<Item> items, GameLogic currentGame)
      Initializes an A TableModel for a table. This displays items in stores or the players cargo.
      Parameters:
      items - The items that are being displayed.
      currentGame - The game information.
